definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
sweet words, beautiful phrases (idiom); hypocritical flattery

sentences.english: Hello. Welcome to American Cafe. I'm Jody. So, Yang Chen, this is a big.
sentences.chinese: 各位听众好，欢迎到美语咖啡屋，我是杨晨。

sentences.english: Fair words will not fill the belly.
Thus, in some respects, the AmE version of MED needs improving.
sentences.chinese: 因此，美语版还有提高的空间和必要。

sentences.english: I didn't think there was anyone who could speak Na'vi like that at this point!
sentences.chinese: 我不觉得当下有人能够把纳美语讲成那样。

sentences.english: J: Thats all for American Cafe.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢大家收听美语咖啡屋。

sentences.english: I am an All-day English teacher at Walton School.
sentences.chinese: 我是华顿全天美语班教师。

sentences.english: Dihedral - The US term for an inside corner.
I have enjoyed teaching All-day English for many reasons.
sentences.chinese: 我乐于教全天美语班有很多原因。

sentences.english: J: And I'm Jody. Welcome to American cafe, where you can meet ...
sentences.chinese: 各位听众好，我是杨晨，欢迎您到美语咖啡屋。

sentences.english: A few words have been added into contemporary mainstream American English.
sentences.chinese: 其中有些文字已被加进现代主流美语中。

sentences.english: Shouts at him in English and Na’vi.
sentences.chinese: 用英语和纳美语向他大叫。

sentences.english: As a result, the influence of American English on the English language is due to the slangs.
sentences.chinese: 因此现在美语对于英语的影响很大程度体现在俚语上。

sentences.english: He speaks haltingly, but with feeling, in Na’vi.
sentences.chinese: 他结结巴巴，但充满感情地用纳美语说着。

sentences.english: Why the outgoing President's felicitation on the indorsement?
sentences.chinese: 为什么卸任总统要对人民的支持巧言美语？

sentences.english: J: Hello I'm Jody and welcome to American Cafe. Hey,  Yang Chen, guess what this sound is.
sentences.chinese: 各位听众好，我是杨晨，欢迎您到美语咖啡屋。

sentences.english: Learn the Modern English dealing with the proper code of conduct to follow while engaged in activities for your company.
sentences.chinese: 学会用洋话连篇现代美语恰当处理公司商务活动。

definition: English Language Teaching (ELT)/studying and teaching English
to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
Korean language (esp. in context of South Korea)
